In England, in the seven days to 10 September, there were 24,845 new confirmed cases (43.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 September, there were 25,198 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 1% (353 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 September is 19,888,584 (35,169.8 cases per 100,000 population).
